title: EphÄ“meris, or, An almanack for the year of our Saviour's incarnation 1696 and from the creation, according to the best of history, 5645 ... : wherein is contained astronomical, astrological, and meteorological observations, lunations, eclipses, the diurnal motions of the planets, remarkable conjunctions, tables of the sun's rising ... : a table of houses ... for the meridian of Norwich, a table of the moon's age, tide tables, ... / by John Taylor.
